About me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

I'm a third-year student of BSUIR who's also intrested in web-development. I prefer C#/.NET for backend (ASP.NET Core in particular). Speaking about frontend, I'm currently learning new HTML5/CSS3(+Sass)/JS(ES6) features and Angular framework.
I'm an advanced English user with FCE (Grade A) certificate for confirmation.
At the moment I'm looking for my first job as a Junior Fullstack .NET Developer/Junior .NET Developer.
